Abstract: Russia's campaign against breakaway republic of Chechnya is still popular, but Russian casualties mount as troops become mired in urban warfare in Grozny, the capital; mood among soldiers is edgy; photo; map (M)
Snippet: Russia's campaign against breakaway republic of Chechnya is still popular, but Russian casualties mount as troops become mired in urban warfare in Grozny, the capital; mood among soldiers is edgy; photo; map (M)
LeadParagraph: After Dmitri Baidanov's legs had been shattered by mortar fire, he crawled for three days through the streets of Grozny until he reached the Russian lines.

Headline.Main: Russian Troops Are Edgy as They Prepare to Go 'Clean' Grozny
Headline.PrintHeadline: YELTSIN RESIGNS; Russian Troops Are Edgy as They Prepare to Go 'Clean' Grozny
